welcome_embed.title: Welcome to the server, {user.name}!
welcome_embed.description: We're glad to have you here. Please read the rules and enjoy your stay!

fields.name: Rules
fields.value:
1. Be respectful
2. No spamming
3. Follow Discord's TOS

fields.name: Get Started
fields.value: Introduce yourself in #introductions and check out #announcements for updates.
